SEARCH
Package nl.saxion.ptbc

Class SaSaCommunicator

java.lang.Object
nl.saxion.ptbc.SaSaCommunicator
public class SaSaCommunicator extends Object
SaSaCommunicator is the library class to use to connect to the SaSa satellite on the (virtual) satellite.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    SaSaCommunicator.Listener
    Listener interface, used for a method reference parameter for receiving messages

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SaSaCommunicator (String name, String host, int port, SaSaCommunicator.Listener listener, boolean logging)
    Create an instance to connect to a specific SaSa satellite (part of the Frog application)
    SaSaCommunicator (String name, SaSaCommunicator.Listener listener)
    Create an instance to connect to the default SaSa satellite (part of the Frog application)

      public static final String DEFAULT_HOST
      Default host for the SaSa satellite
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_PORT

      public static final int DEFAULT_PORT
      Default port number for the SaSa satellite
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • SaSaCommunicator

      public SaSaCommunicator (String name, SaSaCommunicator.Listener listener)
      Create an instance to connect to the default SaSa satellite (part of the Frog application)
      Parameters:
      name - name of the client
      listener - reference to a method implementing the Listener interface, which will be called for every message

    • SaSaCommunicator

      public SaSaCommunicator (String name, String host, int port, SaSaCommunicator.Listener listener, boolean logging)
      Create an instance to connect to a specific SaSa satellite (part of the Frog application)
      Parameters:
      name - name of the client
      host - hostname or IP-address of the SaSa satellite
      port - port theSaSa satellite listens to
      listener - reference to a method implementing the Listener interface, which will be called for every message
      logging - if logging to System.err is to take place (or not)

  • Method Details

    • sleep

      public void sleep (int ms)
      Sleep (wait) the given number of milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      ms - time to sleep in milliseconds

    • isConnected

      public final boolean isConnected()
      Determine if the current client is connected to the SaSa satellite
      Returns:
      if the current client is connected

    • send

      public void send (String message)
      Send a message to all other clients of the SaSa satellite
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send (without the name of the sending client, which will automatically be prepended)

    • close

      public final void close()
      Close the connection to the SaSa satellite The client cannot reconnect

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the name used by the communicator, as provided in the constructor.
      Returns:
      name

    • getMessages

      public final List<String> getMessages()
      Get the waiting messages (to be processed).
      Returns:
      a list of waiting messages
